item.description:
noJava but Kayaking: Paddling on the Charles

 

Summer is almost here. And it will lend itself to noJava. Just this time!

 

Join me for a paddling experience on the Charles River.

You will rent your kayak at the Kendall Square http://www.paddleboston.com/kendall.php location

More details for Canoes and Kayaks that can be rented at the Charles River Canoe and Kayak.

 

If you do not know how to paddle, do not worry: I will teach you!

 

You must be serious and committed  before you RSVP YES.

There will be a kayak/canoe rental fee for this that you pay directly to the Charles River: http://www.paddleboston.com/kendall/rates.php

 

Meeting at

 

Charles River Canoe & Kayak :: Cambridge @ Kendall Square Here is their number in case you want: (617) 965-5110

Paddlefully in Java

 

Burc Oral
item.name: noJava and Kayaking
